tr_quotes.quote: Bir kayıptan öğrenirseniz, kaybetmiş olmazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin gerçeklikle nasıl yüzleştiği bir seçimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, bilginin anasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübesiz akıl, bir iş beceremez.
tr_quotes.author: Che Lehmann

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, ruhu ve kalbi iyileştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Alman Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, herkesin hatalarına verdiği addır.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe aklın hocası, düşüncenin de rehberidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önceki hatalarıma selam söyle. Onların adı artık tecrübe.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, hayatın sana kel kaldıktan sonra tarak vermesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe sert bir öğretmendir. Önce sınav yapar sonra ders verir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat ya cesur bir tecrübedir ya da hiçbir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Geçirilen en kötü tecrübeler, en faydalı olanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübenin en büyük gayesi, bize vazifelerimizi öğretmektir.
tr_quotes.author: B. Auerbach

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi hayat kaideleri, insanın bizzat tecrübe ettikleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anselm Feurbach

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, her maskenin altında duranı, daha o maske inmeden tanımaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta en pahalı şey tecrübedir. Çünkü kazanmak için kaybetmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimdeki temel zorluk, fikirlerden tecrübe çıkarmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: George Santayana

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen olgunlaşmak için incinmek, tecrübe kazanmak için kaybetmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübelerimizle biliyoruz ki kimse tecrübelerden, ders almıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyi kaybetseniz bile, tecrübeleriniz size kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe tarak gibidir; hayat insana verir ama kel olduğu zaman.
tr_quotes.author: Belçika Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar tecrübeleri kadar değil, tecrübe kapasiteleri kadar bilgedir.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Deneyimden bilgece yararlanırsanız, hiçbir şey zaman kaybı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Aguste Rodes

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat çözülmesi gereken bir problem değil, tecrübe edilmesi gereken bir gerçekliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün sahip olduğumuz bilginin tecrübe ile başladığına şüphe yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: İmmanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübeler, en iyi öğretmenlerdir; yalnız, okul masrafları biraz çoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Cariyle

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe bir gözlüktür, onların sayesinde ikinci defa daha iyi görürsünüz.
tr_quotes.author: Henrich Ibsen

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübelerime dayanarak söyleyebilirim ki; bir kadın ne kadar güzelse o kadar manyaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızca yapmış olduklarımızdan değil, kaçındığımız işlerden de sorumluyuz.
tr_quotes.author: Jean B. Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: İyi insan mutluluk, kötü insan tecrübe, yanlış insan ders, mükemmel insan iz bırakır.
tr_quotes.author: La Edri

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının acılarından, geçmiş felaketlerden ders alanlar, gerçekten mutlu kimselerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, okulların en gelişmişidir, o okulda, aptallar bile bir şeyler öğrenirler.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Gençlerin, kendi kendilerine kazandıkları tecrübeler, kendilerinin en iyi yardımcılarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: E. Gebiel

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, bir insanın başından geçenler değil, başından geçenlerin bıraktığı izlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Huxley

tr_quotes.quote: Acaba dünyada, başkalarının tecrübelerinden istifade edecek kadar akıllı bir insan var mıdır?
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlanarak değil, yaşayarak tecrübe kazanılır. Zaman insanları değil, armutları olgunlaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Peyami Safa

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kazandığı tecrübeler, ölçü ile yapılan giysilere benzerler; kim kazanmışsa yalnız ona yararlar.
tr_quotes.author: Carlo Levi

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın tecrübesini başından ne geçtiği değil, başından geçenlerden nasıl yararlandığını gösterir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Huxley

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe okulunun öğrenim ücreti yüksektir; ama akılsızlara bir şeyler öğretebilen, başka okul da yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın türlü çağlarına hep taptaze geliriz ve yaşamımız ne olursa olsun, çok kere tecrübeden yoksun bulunuruz.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Deneyimden bilgece yararlanırsanız, hiçbir şey zaman kaybı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlanarak değil yaşayarak tecrübe kazanılır, zaman insanları değil armutları olgunlaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Peyami Safa

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, ruhu ve kalbi iyileştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Alman Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, bilginin anasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe hayatın insana kel olduktan sonra tarak vermesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, zalim bir öğretmendir; önce imtihan eder, sonra öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi hayat kaideleri, insanın bizzat tecrübe ettikleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe, okulların en gelişmişidir, o okulda, aptallar bile bir şeyler öğrenirler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kazandığı tecrübeler, ölçü ile yapılan giysilere benzerler; kim kazanmışsa yalnız ona yararlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimdeki temel zorluk, fikirlerden tecrübe çıkarmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Değişmek zaman gerektirmez tecrübe gerektirir...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tecrübe tarak gibidir; hayat insana verir ama kel olduğu zaman.
tr_quotes.author: Belçika Atasözü

en_quotes.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: The way we experience the world around us is a direct reflection of the world within us
en_quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: The reward of suffering is experience
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: For me, life is about experience and being a good person
en_quotes.author: Chris Hemsworth

en_quotes.quote: Food is not just eating energy. It's an experience
en_quotes.author: Guy Fieri

en_quotes.quote: Adventure is worthwhile
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Your life will be a blessed and balanced experience if you first honor your identity and priority
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is about experience: not only visual but also what you can touch, what you can feel
en_quotes.author: Ma Yansong

en_quotes.quote: It's a lovely experience walking around a museum by yourself
en_quotes.author: Brad Pitt

en_quotes.quote: An identity would seem to be arrived at by the way in which the person faces and uses his experience
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: Experience is the teacher of all things
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: The wise are instructed by reason, average minds by experience, the stupid by necessity and the brute by instinct
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Experience is a dim lamp, which only lights the one who bears it
en_quotes.author: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

en_quotes.quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience
en_quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

en_quotes.quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: The whole world, as we experience it visually, comes to us through the mystic realm of color
en_quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

en_quotes.quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: Nothing ever becomes real till it is experienced
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: Experience is one thing you can't get for nothing
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: If you want to run, run a mile. If you want to experience a different life, run a marathon
en_quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

en_quotes.quote: I grew up like a neglected weed - ignorant of liberty, having no experience of it
en_quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

en_quotes.quote: A shirt's not just a shirt. It's the experience of what goes into that shirt
en_quotes.author: Michael Bastian

en_quotes.quote: The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice
en_quotes.author: Frank McCourt

en_quotes.quote: Any institutions' alumni are key to its growth. We are focused on giving a global experience to our students
en_quotes.author: Shiv Nadar

en_quotes.quote: Best thing that's happened this year? Maybe Hostel. It was a great experience. I loved it
en_quotes.author: Jay Hernandez

en_quotes.quote: The spectacles of experience; through them you will see clearly a second time
en_quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

en_quotes.quote: To me the arcade experience is the ultimate gaming experience
en_quotes.author: Eugene Jarvis

en_quotes.quote: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: There's simply no substitute for experience in terms of aviation safety
en_quotes.author: Chesley Sullenberger

en_quotes.quote: Judgement comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgement
en_quotes.author: Simon Bolivar

en_quotes.quote: The next time you experience a blackout, take some solace by looking at the sky. You will not recognize it
en_quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

en_quotes.quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything
en_quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

en_quotes.quote: For me, there is no such thing as a negative experience
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Experience is like a comb that life gives you when you are bald
en_quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

en_quotes.quote: Experience teaches only the teachable
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Innocence can be more powerful than experience
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

en_quotes.quote: To wear a floral shirt is an experience
en_quotes.author: Brian Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Android is often given as a free replacement for a feature phone, and the experience isn't as good as an iPhone
en_quotes.author: Phil Schiller

en_quotes.quote: Customer loyalty comes from consistent experience. They learn to count on you
en_quotes.author: Jimmy John Liautaud

en_quotes.quote: It's been said that astronomy is a humbling and, I might add, a character-building experience
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: To reach something good it is very useful to have gone astray, and thus acquire experience
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Experience praises the most happy the one who made the most people happy
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: From start to finish, my experience with 'Moonlight' has been the most unique thing
en_quotes.author: Trevante Rhodes

en_quotes.quote: It is a heartening experience to know that you are loved and being missed
en_quotes.author: Sridevi

en_quotes.quote: When we shift our perception, our experience changes
en_quotes.author: Lindsay Wagner

en_quotes.quote: All adventures, especially into new territory, are scary
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: My path has not been determined. I shall have more experiences and pass many more milestones
en_quotes.author: Agnetha Faltskog

en_quotes.quote: We shall not grow wiser before we learn that much that we have done was very foolish
en_quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

en_quotes.quote: It's a great, great experience to finally get the reception that you know you rightfully deserve
en_quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

en_quotes.quote: I love the work that goes into making a movie and creating a different world. It is a wholesome experience
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: I'm afraid, based on my own experience, that fascism will come to America in the name of national security
en_quotes.author: Jim Garrison

en_quotes.quote: The words printed here are concepts. You must go through the experiences
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: We deem those happy who from the experience of life have learnt to bear its ills without being overcome by them
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: Experience has shown how deeply the seeds of war are planted by economic rivalry and social injustice
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you are lucky, sometimes you're unlucky. It all weighs out at the end. That is my experience at least
en_quotes.author: Toto Wolff

en_quotes.quote: The prism through which you experience life is so unique. There is no objective experience
en_quotes.author: Sterling K. Brown

en_quotes.quote: The social element has really transformed the gaming experience
en_quotes.author: Bobby Kotick

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that a bitter experience can make you stronger
en_quotes.author: Mel Gibson

en_quotes.quote: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis
en_quotes.author: Carre Otis

en_quotes.quote: Every experience, good or bad, you have to learn from
en_quotes.author: Patrick Mahomes

en_quotes.quote: Missionary work has never been easy, and yet the joyful rewards cannot be equaled by any other experience
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: The key to education is the experience of beauty
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: True intuitive expertise is learned from prolonged experience with good feedback on mistakes
en_quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

en_quotes.quote: I've always loved the experience of working together with other people toward an artistic goal
en_quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

en_quotes.quote: I want to have an 'Eat, Pray, Love' experience where I drop off the face of the planet and move to Greece
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

en_quotes.quote: Faces are the ledgers of our experience
en_quotes.author: Richard Avedon

en_quotes.quote: Experience is something you don't get until just after you need it
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life
en_quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

en_quotes.quote: Maturity and experience are part of my liberation
en_quotes.author: Alicia Keys

en_quotes.quote: The head learns new things, but the heart forever practices old experiences
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills
en_quotes.author: Minna Antrim

en_quotes.quote: The responsibility of a writer is to excavate the experience of the people who produced him
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: Police officers see everything, and they experience everything, and they don't always act correctly
en_quotes.author: Cheo Hodari Coker

en_quotes.quote: Art is a direct reflection of the life you live. What you experience comes out in your work
en_quotes.author: Dianne Reeves

en_quotes.quote: The essence of a role-playing game is that it is a group, cooperative experience
en_quotes.author: Gary Gygax

en_quotes.quote: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Everything that we experience every day leaves a long-lasting impression
en_quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

en_quotes.quote: It's just been such an amazing experience from the day I started on 'Smackdown.'
en_quotes.author: Carmella

en_quotes.quote: People around the world, they want the authentic Starbucks experience
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: I know from experience that you should never give up on yourself or others, no matter what
en_quotes.author: George Foreman

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a genius. I'm just a tremendous bundle of experience
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: My experience as a refugee had made me strong; I could survive anything, even the world of fashion
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Loneliness is and always has been the central and inevitable experience of every man
en_quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

en_quotes.quote: Most of the people that I deal with are human. So I've had a lot of experience with that
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: No matter what you're doing, live it. Make an experience. Have fun. Relate to someone. Take them in. Learn
en_quotes.author: Minka Kelly

en_quotes.quote: All experience is an arch, to build upon
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: What one has not experienced, one will never understand in print
en_quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

en_quotes.quote: I need to take everything one step at a time. If I think about that too much, I'll miss this amazing experience
en_quotes.author: Shanice Williams

en_quotes.quote: Every single 'no' that you get, you know that that was an experience that you learned from. Keep going
en_quotes.author: Kirstin Maldonado

en_quotes.quote: To be a good director, you have to have good life experience. I'm getting there
en_quotes.author: Thomas Brodie-Sangster

en_quotes.quote: Example is the best precept
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: See any detour as an opportunity to experience new things
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Experience really does make you better, man
en_quotes.author: Alan Vega

en_quotes.quote: You are about to have your first experience with a Greek lunch. I will kill you if you pretend to like it
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: Two things control men's nature, instinct and experience
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Happy Days was a wonderful, wonderful experience and I would not have traded it for the world
en_quotes.author: Marion Ross

en_quotes.quote: Social connection is such a basic feature of human experience that when we are deprived of it, we suffer
en_quotes.author: Leonard Mlodinow

en_quotes.quote: The great thing about Snapchat is your fans can get a detailed experience of what your life is like behind the scenes
en_quotes.author: Antonio Brown

en_quotes.quote: Experience which was once claimed by the aged is now claimed exclusively by the young
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: It was a great experience to work with director A. L. Vijay
en_quotes.author: Keerthy Suresh

en_quotes.quote: It is about the entire experience. It's not just a new seat. It's not just new meals. It's not just better wines
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: The writing process for me is pretty much always the same - it's a solitary experience
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

en_quotes.quote: In art school, you learn that design is much more than the look and feel of something - it's the whole experience
en_quotes.author: Joe Gebbia

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely
en_quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

en_quotes.quote: Everything is discursive opinion instead of direct experience
en_quotes.author: A. R. Ammons

en_quotes.quote: I didn't get to experience proper autumn until I was eighteen and heading off to college on the East Coast!
en_quotes.author: Alexandra Bracken

en_quotes.quote: I want the poem to be an experience - for both the listener and for myself
en_quotes.author: Anne Waldman

en_quotes.quote: A moment's insight is sometimes worth a life's experience
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: Quality is a direct experience independent of and prior to intellectual abstractions
en_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

en_quotes.quote: A world-changing vision often necessitates a profound simplicity in the user experience
en_quotes.author: Joe Gebbia

en_quotes.quote: Nothing which has entered into our experience is ever lost
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: You don't cheat anybody out of their experience, whatever it is
en_quotes.author: Andre Agassi

en_quotes.quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience
en_quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

en_quotes.quote: A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: The years teach much which the days never know
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: You learn from a conglomeration of the incredible past - whatever experience gotten in any way whatsoever
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Experience, as a desire for experience, does not come off. We must not study ourselves while having an experience
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser
en_quotes.author: John W. Gardner

en_quotes.quote: Hands-on experience is the best way to learn about all the interdisciplinary aspects of robotics
en_quotes.author: Rodney Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Education is when you read the fine print. Experience is what you get if you don't
en_quotes.author: Pete Seeger

en_quotes.quote: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: I speak to the black experience, but I am always talking about the human condition
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: A proverb is a short sentence based on long experience
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: Is there anyone so wise as to learn by the experience of others?
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a new journey for me, and I feel like, in my lifetime, I've been blessed to experience such a lot
en_quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

en_quotes.quote: Racism exists, but it is far less rampant than ignorance, and ignorance can be cured through experience
en_quotes.author: Candace Owens

en_quotes.quote: The more you are blessed with experience, the fuller and the more enriched you are in your craft
en_quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: Do I wish I had never endured postpartum depression? Absolutely. But to deny the experience is to deny who I am
en_quotes.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

en_quotes.quote: Good design to me is both appearance and functionality together. It's the experience that makes it good design
en_quotes.author: Michael Graves

en_quotes.quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: The experience of pain or loss can be a formidably motivating force
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: The act of birth is the first experience of anxiety, and thus the source and prototype of the affect of anxiety
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: Good judgement comes from experience. Sometimes, experience comes from bad judgement
en_quotes.author: Christian Slater

en_quotes.quote: When you have really exhausted an experience you always reverence and love it
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Men are wise in proportion, not to their experience, but to their capacity for experience
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Experience does not err. Only your judgments err by expecting from her what is not in her power
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Brooklyn is not the easiest place to grow up in, although I wouldn't change that experience for anything
en_quotes.author: Neil Diamond

en_quotes.quote: Sleep - the most beautiful experience in life - except drink
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: Remember, we are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Mistakes are painful when they happen, but years later a collection of mistakes is what is called experience
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: When we learn from experience, the scars of sin can lead us to restoration and a renewed intimacy with God
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Man, I'm a conspiracy theorist by nature. You can't experience the federal penal system and not be somewhat skeptical
en_quotes.author: T.I.

en_quotes.quote: The only relevant test of the validity of a hypothesis is comparison of prediction with experience
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Experience is that marvelous thing that enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: Experience is a great teacher
en_quotes.author: John Legend

en_quotes.quote: I'm a culture vulture, and I just want to experience it all
en_quotes.author: Debbie Harry

en_quotes.quote: In my experience, being busy and working hard is the key to sanity/happiness
en_quotes.author: Jemima Khan

en_quotes.quote: Extreme programming is an emotional experience
en_quotes.author: Kent Beck

en_quotes.quote: Playing on the Burj Al Arab helipad was an unforgettable experience, and the view of Dubai was incredible
en_quotes.author: Ma Long

en_quotes.quote: Sydney's a beautiful city. It was a great experience
en_quotes.author: Barbara Hershey

en_quotes.quote: Whoever doesn't know it must learn and find by experience that 'a quiet conscience makes one strong!'
en_quotes.author: Anne Frank

en_quotes.quote: The noblest search is the search for excellence
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I mean, if you didn't get it or if you didn't feel like you enjoyed it, sometimes that experience can change
en_quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

en_quotes.quote: The value of experience is not in seeing much, but in seeing wisely
en_quotes.author: William Osler

en_quotes.quote: Experience is what you get while looking for something else
en_quotes.author: Federico Fellini

en_quotes.quote: I have but one lamp by which my feet are guided, and that is the lamp of experience
en_quotes.author: Patrick Henry

en_quotes.quote: I'm a game designer, so I care about the whole experience
en_quotes.author: Jenova Chen

en_quotes.quote: Wherever the wind blows me, I'll go! My eventual goal is to have enough experience to produce something on my own
en_quotes.author: Fawad Khan

en_quotes.quote: It's such a fun experience getting to kind of create something from nothing with your best friend
en_quotes.author: Maddie Marlow

en_quotes.quote: If merely 'feeling good' could decide, drunkenness would be the supremely valid human experience
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather have a lot of talent and a little experience than a lot of experience and a little talent
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: What is easy is seldom excellent
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Conviction without experience makes for harshness
en_quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: There are many truths of which the full meaning cannot be realized until personal experience has brought it home
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: Experience is the extract of suffering
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: Experience teaches us that we do not always receive the blessings we ask for in prayer
en_quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

en_quotes.quote: I've always believed you go to literature to find the shared human experience, not the categorized human experience
en_quotes.author: Alice McDermott

en_quotes.quote: Experience is the only prophecy of wise men
en_quotes.author: Alphonse de Lamartine

en_quotes.quote: If we could sell our experiences for what they cost us, we'd all be millionaires
en_quotes.author: Pauline Phillips

en_quotes.quote: The more accurately one can illuminate a particular human experience, the better the work of art
en_quotes.author: Claire Messud

en_quotes.quote: I write about my life and my own experience, but I also write about things that I have no knowledge of whatsoever
en_quotes.author: Reeve Carney

en_quotes.quote: Life is an aggregate of experience, which continually surprises us
en_quotes.author: Ron Carlson

en_quotes.quote: A bicycle has transformed my experience of London
en_quotes.author: Iain Glen

en_quotes.quote: Many of the insights of the saint stem from their experience as sinners
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Everyone should just drive out to the Mojave Desert and just experience it, and it's a fun place to live
en_quotes.author: Bill Burr

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing so easy to learn as experience and nothing so hard to apply
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Not to transmit an experience is to betray it
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: Experience is what enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: There are some hurts that we experience that can be forgiven but we won't forget them
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Connecting dots is not that rewarding of an experience
en_quotes.author: Damon Lindelof

en_quotes.quote: Not the fruit of experience, but experience itself, is the end
en_quotes.author: Walter Pater

en_quotes.quote: Language is not simply a reporting device for experience but a defining framework for it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Whorf

en_quotes.quote: God is only a great imaginative experience
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves - in finding themselves
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: But inner experience is only one source of human knowledge
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment
en_quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

en_quotes.quote: I have always loved blizzards, if only because of the driving experience - which is definitely an acquired taste
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Deep experience is never peaceful
en_quotes.author: Henry James

en_quotes.quote: I am very happy since when I am in different cities I can experience and learn different cultures!
en_quotes.author: Yani Tseng

en_quotes.quote: There are some things you only learn through experience
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: Experience is a good school. But the fees are high
en_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

en_quotes.quote: Most of the images of reality on which we base our actions are really based on vicarious experience
en_quotes.author: Albert Bandura

en_quotes.quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience
en_quotes.author: James Beard

en_quotes.quote: I became an academic so that I could share my knowledge and experience with students
en_quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has a breakup in their lives, and I think everyone should experience love
en_quotes.author: Hansika Motwani

en_quotes.quote: Good judgment comes from experience and experience comes from bad judgment
en_quotes.author: Fred Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Doesn't all experience crumble in the end to mere literary material?
en_quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

en_quotes.quote: I've learnt so much over time and with the experience that I've gained. You can't please everyone
en_quotes.author: Alexis Sanchez

en_quotes.quote: Experience is the child of thought, and thought is the child of action
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The experience of God, or in any case the possibility of experiencing God, is innate
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: All adventure is now reactionary
en_quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I go by instinct - I don't worry about experience
en_quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

en_quotes.quote: See, when I paint, it is an experience that, at its best, is transcending reality
en_quotes.author: Keith Haring

en_quotes.quote: As artists, we can't help but infuse our art with our own experience, so your experience becomes informative
en_quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Real love is a permanently self-enlarging experience
en_quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

en_quotes.quote: But my experience is that people who have been through painful, difficult times are filled with compassion
en_quotes.author: Amy Grant

en_quotes.quote: Working through experience is best for me, just being there and trying to get into the mode
en_quotes.author: Ludacris

en_quotes.quote: I didn't think; I experimented
en_quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

en_quotes.quote: Ordinary professionalism and 20 years' experience can accomplish a lot, but it can't access the hidden places
en_quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

en_quotes.quote: I'll admit I was curious about coaching a national team, but my experience with Greece was sufficient
en_quotes.author: Claudio Ranieri

en_quotes.quote: Information's pretty thin stuff unless mixed with experience
en_quotes.author: Clarence Day

en_quotes.quote: I used to think I'd like to have been a pioneer on the Oregon Trail, experience untamed America
en_quotes.author: Tracie Peterson

en_quotes.quote: There is no aspect of our experience not molded in some way by metaphor's almost imperceptible touch
en_quotes.author: James Geary

en_quotes.quote: Comedy is a shared experience, and I think it's great to open that to a wide demographic
en_quotes.author: Dave Coulier

en_quotes.quote: Everything has been said before, but since nobody listens we have to keep going back and beginning all over again
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: An optimist is a guy that has never had much experience
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: All the suffering and joy we experience depend on conditions
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: With experience in boxing, you learn how to be a scientific boxer and how to fight easy
en_quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

en_quotes.quote: Experience enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: The only thing we have learnt from experience is that we learn nothing from experience
en_quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

en_quotes.quote: We are each responsible for all of our experiences
en_quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

en_quotes.quote: Our experience is composed rather of illusions lost than of wisdom acquired
en_quotes.author: Joseph Roux

en_quotes.quote: I think we are a product of all our experiences
en_quotes.author: Sanford I. Weill

en_quotes.quote: Experience: that most brutal of teachers. But you learn, my God do you learn
en_quotes.author: William Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: Tragedy makes you grow up
en_quotes.author: Jane Campion

en_quotes.quote: Every moment is an experience
en_quotes.author: Jake Roberts

en_quotes.quote: All experience is subjective
en_quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

en_quotes.quote: The more you do, the more experience you have and the next time it will be easier to choose the right thing
en_quotes.author: Andy Lau

en_quotes.quote: Few people even scratch the surface, much less exhaust the contemplation of their own experience
en_quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

en_quotes.quote: Defeat is a wonderful experience if it motivates you to never forget you're only as good as your last performance
en_quotes.author: Paul Heyman

en_quotes.quote: My experiences have taught me a lot and I'm happy with my learnings, if not with what I went through to learn
en_quotes.author: Ally Sheedy

en_quotes.quote: All that I know I learned after I was thirty
en_quotes.author: Georges Clemenceau

en_quotes.quote: By experience we find out a short way by a long wandering
en_quotes.author: Roger Ascham

en_quotes.quote: Color is an intense experience on its own
en_quotes.author: Jim Hodges

en_quotes.quote: Explorers have to be ready to die lost
en_quotes.author: Russell Hoban

en_quotes.quote: Bitter experience has taught us how fundamental our values are and how great the mission they represent
en_quotes.author: Jan Peter Balkenende

en_quotes.quote: Judgment comes from experience - and experience comes from bad judgment
en_quotes.author: Walter Wriston
